welcomeMessage: Murakaza neza muri communaute yacu. Turishimye kubakira hano. Paruwoya yacu ni ahantu hakiriye kandi hatanga ikaze, aho buri wese ashyikirwa mu birori n'ibikorwa byacu. Twemera ko buri muntu atanga impano n'ubuhanga bwihariye byongera ku ishyirahamwe ryacu. Turabashishikariza kwifatanya mu nzego zitandukanye z'ibikorwa byacu, yaba ari mu muziki, gukwirakwiza ubutumwa, uburezi cyangwa ahandi. Intego yacu ni uguteza imbere umuco wo kwiyumvamo no gufashanya mu rugendo rwacu rw'iyobokamana. Dutanga serivisi zitandukanye n'ibikorwa bigamije gufasha buri muntu muri paruwoya yacu, kuva ku bana kugeza ku basaza. Dufite kandi amahirwe yo gukura ku giti cyacu no gukora ibikorwa byiza muri communaute. Ntutindiganye kuvugana n'abakozi bacu cyangwa abajyanama niba ufite ikibazo cyangwa ukeneye ubufasha. Dufite hano kugira ngo tugufashe no kukuba hafi. Murakoze kuba igice cya paruwoya yacu. Turiteguye kubamenya neza no gukura hamwe mu kwemera. Murakaza neza kandi Imana iguhe umugisha.
aboutDescription: Menya byinshi ku mateka, inshingano, n'agaciro byacu.
serviceDescription: Menya serivisi zitandukanye dutanga muri communaute yacu.

banner.title: Murakaza neza muri Katedrali yacu
banner.description: Menya amateka yacu n'ubumwe bwacu muri Katedrali. Twifatanye mu masengesho n'ibikorwa byose muri uyu mwaka.

abouts.historyContent: Katedrali yacu ifite amateka akomeye y'igihe kirekire, agera ku myaka myinshi, yubatse kuba urumuri rw'icyizere n'ubumwe mu buzima bw'abaturage.

mission.title: Inshingano zacu
mission.content: Inshingano zacu ni ugufasha communaute n'umutima w'urukundo n'ubwitange, dufasha gukura mu iyobokamana no kubaka ahantu hiteguye kubakira buri wese.

vision.title: Icyerekezo cyacu
vision.content: Icyerekezo cyacu ni ukuba urumuri rw'iyobokamana n'icyizere, dutanga umwanya n'ubushobozi ku bantu kugira ngo babashe kubaho bakurikije agaciro kabo no gufasha kugera ku nyungu rusange.

commission.title: Komisiyo y'Abayobozi b'abayobozi b'abakristu
commission.content: Abayobozi b'abakristu bafite uruhare runini mu gufasha ibikorwa muri paruwoya yacu no kuyobora communaute. Biyemeje gukorera n'ubwitange no gutanga ubuyobozi mu nzego zitandukanye.

aboutTopStories.storyContent1: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...
aboutTopStories.storyContent2: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...

topNewsNotice.title: Itangazo ryo gutangiza gahunda y'Ubuvugizi bw'Abaturage
topNewsNotice.content: Turishimye gutangaza gutangiza gahunda nshya y'ubuvugizi bw'abaturage izatangira umwezi utaha. Iyi gahunda izafasha imiryango ikennye yo mu karere kacu binyujijwe mu bikorwa byo gukusanya ibiribwa, amahugurwa y'uburezi n'amahirwe yo kuba umukozi w'ibyubahiro. Twifuza ko bose bashyigikira no kugira uruhare muri gahunda zacu.

topNewsNotice.title: Impinduka Nziza mu Gushaka Inkunga ku Muryango
topNewsNotice.content: Murakoze ku bantu bose bitabiriye igikorwa cyo guteranya inkunga mu muryango wacu! Turishimye gutangaza ko twarushijeho kurenga intego yacu, tubona $15,000 ku mirimo y'ubusugire bw'ibikorwa by'umuryango. Kugira umutima w'umuntu wibuka aracyishimira kandi twiteguye gukoresha aya mafaranga kugirango tubyaze umusaruro ibikorwa byacu.

topNewsNotice.title: Itangazo ry'Imishinga Nshya ya Gahunda y'Ubuvugizi bw'Urubyiruko
topNewsNotice.content: Turishimye kugaragaza gahunda nshya ya Gahunda y'Ubuvugizi bw'Urubyiruko igamije gukora ibikorwa by'ingirakamaro mu gufasha urubyiruko. Gahunda izibanda ku guterana buri cyumweru, amasomo y'ibitekerezo ndetse n'imyidagaduro.

topNewsNotice.title: Ikoranabuhanga rigezweho mu Gahunda ya 'Online Donations Platform'
topNewsNotice.content: Turishimye gutangaza gutangiza urubuga rushya rwa internet rugufasha kwishyura ibikorwa byo gutera inkunga. Iki gikoresho kizoroha gutanga inkunga no gukurikirana imishinga y'ubufasha. Ushobora gutangira gukoresha urubuga rwacu kuri murandasi.

announcements.title: Amatangazo
announcements.item1Title: Igitaramo cya Noheli, muri Saint Michel
announcements.item1Description: Mwifatanye natwe mu kwizihiza uyu munsi w'ibanze.
announcements.item2Description: Mwifatanye natwe mu gitaramo cyo kwizihiza Pasika.
announcements.item3Description: Umunsi wo guhurira hamwe no kongera ubumwe bw'abaturage.

donationOptions.title: Ituro
donationOptions.description: Tera inkunga ibikorwa bya buri munsi bya paruwasi, harimo umuriro, isuku n'imishahara y'abakozi. Ushobora gutanga inkunga ukoresheje MOMO: *182*8*1*077222#.

donationOptions.title: Icyacumi
donationOptions.description: Ituro rya 10% ry'inyungu zawe mu gushyigikira umurimo w'itorero n'ibikorwa byaryo. Inkunga ishobora gutangwa kuri konti ya Equity: 4024 4200011597 cyangwa kuri konti ya GT Bank: 211103701151180.

donationOptions.title: Imfashanyo
donationOptions.description: Inkunga igenewe gufasha abari mu kaga, harimo ibiribwa n'ubutabazi bwihuse. Inkunga ishobora gutangwa kuri konti ya Equity: 4024 4200011597 cyangwa kuri konti ya GT Bank: 211103701151180.

donationOptions.title: Ituro ridasanzwe
donationOptions.description: Inkunga igenewe ibikorwa bidasanzwe nk'ivugurura ry'inyubako cyangwa inkunga y'ibirori runaka. Inkunga ishobora gutangwa kuri konti ya Equity: 4024 4200011597 cyangwa kuri konti ya GT Bank: 211103701151180.

donationOptions.title: Ituro ryo kwibuka
donationOptions.description: Tanga ituro wibuka umukunzi wawe mu kumwubaha no gushyigikira itorero. Inkunga ishobora gutangwa ukoresheje MOMO: *182*8*1*077222#.

donationOptions.title: Gutura igitambo cya misa
donationOptions.description: Tanga ituro kugira ngo misa ivugirwe umuntu cyangwa umugambi runaka. Inkunga ishobora gutangwa ukoresheje MOMO: *182*8*1*077222#.

donationOptions.title: MOMO
donationOptions.description: Kanda *182*8*1*077222# kuri Paruwasi Gatolika Saint Michel.
